00093 template <class T>
00094 struct math
00095 {
00096   inline static T acos  (T x)
00097      {
00098         mrASSERT( x >= static_cast<T>(-1.0) );
00099         mrASSERT( x <= static_cast<T>(1.0) );
00100         return ::acos (double(x));
00101      }  
00102   inline static T asin  (T x)
00103      {
00104         mrASSERT( x >= static_cast<T>(-1.0) );
00105         mrASSERT( x <= static_cast<T>(1.0) );
00106         return ::asin (double(x));
00107      }
00108   inline static T atan  (T x)       {return ::atan (double(x));}
00109   inline static T atan2 (T x, T y)  {return ::atan2 (double(x), double(y));}
00110   inline static T cos   (T x)       {return ::cos (double(x));}
00111   inline static T sin   (T x)       {return ::sin (double(x));}
00112   inline static T tan   (T x)       {return ::tan (double(x));}
00113   inline static T cosh  (T x)       {return ::cosh (double(x));}
00114   inline static T sinh  (T x)       {return ::sinh (double(x));}
00115   inline static T tanh  (T x)       {return ::tanh (double(x));}
00116   inline static T exp   (T x)       {return ::exp (double(x));}
00117   inline static T log   (T x)       {return ::log (double(x));}
00118   inline static T log10 (T x)       {return ::log10 (double(x));}
00119   inline static T modf  (T x, T *y) {return ::modf (double(x), double(y));}
00120   inline static T pow   (T x, T y)  {return ::pow (double(x), double(y));}
00121   inline static T sqrt  (T x)       {return ::sqrt (double(x));}
00122   inline static T ceil  (T x)       {return ::ceil (double(x));}
00123   inline static T fabs  (T x)       {return ::fabs (double(x));}
00124   inline static T floor (T x)       {return ::floor (double(x));}
00125   inline static T fmod  (T x, T y)  {return ::fmod (double(x), double(y));}
00126   inline static T hypot (T x, T y)  {return ::hypot (double(x), double(y));}
00127 
00128 };

00132 struct math<float>
00133 {
00134   inline static float   acos  (float x)
00135      {
00136         mrASSERT( x >= -1.0f );
00137         mrASSERT( x <= 1.0f );
00138         return (float)::acos (x);
00139      } 
00140   inline static float   asin  (float x)
00141      {
00142         mrASSERT( x >= -1.0f );
00143         mrASSERT( x <= 1.0f );
00144         return (float)::asin (x);
00145      }
00146   inline static float atan  (float x)            {return (float)::atan (x);}
00147   inline static float atan2 (float x, float y) {return (float)::atan2 (x, y);}
00148   inline static float cos   (float x)            {return (float)::cos (x);}
00149   inline static float sin   (float x)            {return (float)::sin (x);}
00150   inline static float tan   (float x)            {return (float)::tan (x);}
00151   inline static float cosh  (float x)            {return (float)::cosh (x);}

00155   inline static float log   (float x)            {return (float)::log (x);}
00156   inline static float log10 (float x)            {return (float)::log10 (x);}
00157   //   inline static float modf  (float x, float *y) {return ::modf (x, y);}
00158   inline static float pow   (float x, float y) {return (float)::pow (x, y);}
00159   inline static float sqrt  (float x)            {return (float)::sqrt (x);}

00177         mrASSERT( x <= 1.0f );

00183         mrASSERT( x <= 1.0f );

00211 template < typename T >
00212 inline const T& min(const T& x, const T& y)
00213 {return x < y? x : y; }
00214 
00216 template < typename T >
00217 inline const T& min(const T& x, const T& y, const T& z)
00218 {return min( x, min( y, z ) ); }
00219 
00221 template < typename T >
00222 inline const T& min(const T& w, const T& x, const T& y, const T& z)
00223 {return min( w, min( x, min( y, z ) ) ); }
00224 
00226 template < typename T >
00227 inline const T& max(const T& x, const T& y)
00228 {return x > y? x : y; }
00229 
00231 template < typename T >
00232 inline const T& max(const T& x, const T& y, const T& z)
00233 {return max( x, max( y, z ) ); }
00234 
00236 template < typename T >
00237 inline const T& max(const T& w, const T& x, const T& y, const T& z)
00238 {return max( w, max( x, max( y, z ) ) ); }
00239 
00240 
00243 template< typename T >
00244 inline void
00245 minmax( T& minst, T& maxst, 
00246         const T& s0, const T& s1, const T& s2 )
00247 {
00248    if ( s0 > s1 )
00249    {
00250       if ( s0 > s2 )
00251       {
00252          maxst = s0;
00253          if ( s1 < s2 ) minst = s1;
00254          else           minst = s2;
00255       }
00256       else
00257       {
00258          maxst = s2;
00259          minst = s1;
00260       }
00261    }
00262    else if ( s2 > s1 )
00263    {
00264       maxst = s2;
00265       minst = s0;
00266    }
00267    else
00268    {
00269       maxst = s1;
00270       if ( s0 < s2 ) minst = s0;
00271       else           minst = s2;
00272    }
00273 }
00274 
00275 
00276 template < typename T >
00277 inline bool isEquivalent( const T v, const T x, 
00278                           const T eps = miSCALAR_EPSILON )
00279 {
00280   return ( ((v - eps) < x) && (x < ( v + eps)) );
00281 }
00282 
00283 inline bool isEquivalent( const miGeoScalar v, const miGeoScalar x, 
00284                           const miGeoScalar eps = miGEO_SCALAR_EPSILON )
00285 {
00286   return ( ((v - eps) < x) && (x < ( v + eps)) );
00287 }
00288 
00289 template< class T >
00290 inline int round( const T& x )
00291 {
00292    return fastmath<T>::floor((x) >= (T)0.0 ? (x) + (T)0.5 : (x) - (T)0.5);
00293 }

00298 
00300 inline const miScalar clamp( const miScalar x, const miScalar minVal,
00301                              const miScalar maxVal )
00302 {
00303    if      ( x < minVal ) return minVal;
00304    else if ( x > maxVal ) return maxVal;
00305    return x;
00306 }
00307 
00309 template< class T >
00310 inline const T& clamp( const T& x, const T& minVal, const T& maxVal )
00311 {
00312    if      ( x < minVal ) return minVal;
00313    else if ( x > maxVal ) return maxVal;
00314    return x;
00315 }
00316 
00318 template< class T >
00319 inline T clamp( const T& x, const T& minVal, const miScalar maxVal )
00320 {
00321    if      ( x < minVal ) return minVal;
00322    else if ( x > maxVal ) return T( maxVal );
00323    return x;
00324 }
00325 
00327 template< class T >
00328 inline T clamp( const T& x, const miScalar minVal, const T& maxVal )
00329 {
00330    if      ( x < minVal ) return T( minVal );
00331    else if ( x > maxVal ) return maxVal;
00332    return x;
00333 }
00334 
00336 template< class T >
00337 inline T clamp( const T& x, const miScalar minVal = 0.0f,
00338                 const miScalar maxVal = 1.0f )
00339 {
00340    if      ( x < minVal ) return T( minVal );
00341    else if ( x > maxVal ) return T( maxVal );
00342    return x;
00343 }
